mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.item_category_id AS "itemCategory.id", c.name AS "itemCategory.name", a.source AS "source", a.name AS "name", a.url AS "url", a.logo AS "logo", a.summary AS "summary", a.alpha AS "alpha", a.beta AS "beta", a.gamma AS "gamma", a.delte AS "delte", a.epsilon AS "epsilon", a.cost AS "cost", a.style AS "style", a.last_access AS "lastAccess", a.score AS "score", a.outline AS "outline", a.credit AS "credit", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_item_category c ON c.id = a.item_category_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ope_item( id, item_category_id, source, name, url, logo, summary, alpha, beta, gamma, delte, epsilon, cost, style, last_access, score, outline, credit, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{itemCategory.id}, #{source}, #{name}, #{url}, #{logo}, #{summary}, #{alpha}, #{beta}, #{gamma}, #{delte}, #{epsilon}, #{cost}, #{style}, #{lastAccess}, #{score}, #{outline}, #{credit}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ope_item SET item_category_id = #{itemCategory.id}, source = #{source}, name = #{name}, url = #{url}, logo = #{logo}, summary = #{summary}, alpha = #{alpha}, beta = #{beta}, gamma = #{gamma}, delte = #{delte}, epsilon = #{epsilon}, cost = #{cost}, style = #{style}, last_access = #{lastAccess}, score = #{score}, outline = #{outline}, credit = #{credit}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
